src:
NBA VEČERAS: Svi u plus
Raport iz najjače svetske košarkaške lige

02 Nov 2019



MEMFIS GRIZLIS – FINIKS SANS (klađenje na utakmicu, tip 2, kvota 1,80)


Iako je Finiks ovog leta napokon složio solidnu ekipu, pre svega u startnoj petorci, niko nije očekivao ovako dobre igre Sansa. Oni su na skoru 3-2, a i ta dva poraza su bila minimalna. Ovakav ulazak Finiksa definitivno treba respektovati, nije ih usporila ni suspenzija Diandrea Ejtona, i pokušati iskoristiti lepu kvotu od 1,80. Naravno da Memfis nije ekipa koja ne može pobediti u ovoj utakmici, ali Grizliji su u situaciji kada im je od pobeda mnogo važniji razvoj mladih igrača. Sansi će, s druge strane, pokušati dokazati da su oni taj stadijum ekipe koja nema rezultatske ambicije prevazišli.


TOMAS BRAJANT (broj poena (14,5), tip više, kvota 1,85)


Brajant je bio jedna od retkih svetlih tački prošle sezone Vošingtona. Ovaj mladi centar se pojavio niotkuda i izborio za startnu poziciju i novi ugovor, a ove sezone nastavlja s dobrim igrama. Na proseku je od 14,5 poena, 10,3 skoka, 2,4 blokade i 2,8 asistencija po utakmici, a večeras bi mogao imati svoju noć jer će Minesota igrati bez suspendovanog Karl-Entoni Taunsa. Vukovi će na centarskoj poziciji imati Nou Vonlea, Džordana Bela i Gorkija Jenga, a Brajant je definitivno bolji igrač od njih sve trojice.


KARIS LEVER (broj poena (17,5), tip više, kvota 1,85)


Očekivali smo da će Lever ove sezone koju Bruklin igra bez Kevina Duranta biti drugi igrač ekipe, ali niko nije bio siguran kako će se on uklopiti s Kajrijem Irvingom. To ne izgleda loše, Lever je na proseku od 18,5 poena uz 45,5% šuta i 36,85 za tri poena, a danas bi mogao svoje brojke i podignuti jer Bruklin igra protiv Detroita koji nema neku kvalitetu na bekovskim pozicijama u startnoj petorci pa bi se i Kajri i Karis mogli naigrati.


AL HORFORD (broj poena (16,5), tip više, kvota 1,85)


Još jedan igrač koji bi mogao iskoristiti tuču Karl-Entoni Taunsa i Džoela Embida od pre dva dana i imati dobru utakmicu. Horford i do sada ima punu minutažu (32,8 minuta po utakmici), ali danas bi trebalo da ima mnogo više prostora pod košem. Činjenica je da će s druge strane biti vrlo dobar Hasan Vajtsajd koji zna kako zatvoriti reket, ali Horford je ionako na proseku od 14 poena po utakmici. S Embidom u igri je imao 11,8 šuteva po utakmici s time da je taj broj mogao biti dosta veći da Horford protiv Atlante nije uzeo samo četiri šuta. Bez Embida će Horford sigurno imati više prilika za šut, a ako bude pogađao s ovih 42,6% koliko ima u sezoni, granica bi trebalo da bude pređena.

SERIJE

Nju Orleans je u svih pet utakmica postigao više poena od postavljene granice. Zanimljivo je da su po dva puta postigli 122 i 123 poena, a najmanje što su dali je 116. Granica za utakmicu protiv Oklahome je 113,5. Pelikansi imaju i svih pet utakmica s ukupno više poena po utakmici. Najmanje je palo poena na njihovoj utakmici protiv Dalasa (239), a današnja granica je 228,5. Niti na jednoj utakmici Oklahome nije bilo više od 228 poena. Tander ima i seriju od pet utakmica s manje primljenih poena od granice koja je danas na 113,5. Već smo spomenuli da je Nju Orleans svaki put postigao najmanje 116 poena.
Orlando je ekipa koja postiže najmanje poena u ligi. Na proseku su od 94,8 poena, a niti jednom nisu uspeli da dođu do 100 poena na utakmici te su na svih pet dosadašnjih utakmica bili ispod postavljene granice. Takođe, sve su se njihove utakmice završile s ukupno manje poena od granica. Ni Denver ne daje previše – tek su na 22. mestu lige sa 106 poena po utakmici. Obe ekipe i malo primaju – Orlando 99,6 poena, a Denver 106,4 poena po utakmici. Današnje granice su 98,5 poena na Orlando, 102,5 na Denver i 201,5 na celu utakmicu.
 



 

Piše
: Emir FULURIJA

Foto
: Reuters
text:
NBA Tonight: Everybody's a plus
Raport from the world's strongest basketball league

02 Nov 2019



MEMFIS GRIZLIS - FINIKS SANS (Match Betting, Type 2, Odds 1.80)


Although Phoenix finally put together a solid team this summer, most notably in the starting five, no one expected such a good Sansa game. They are 3-2 on the scoreboard, and those two defeats were minimal. This entry of the Phoenix should definitely be respected, they were not slowed down by the suspension of Diandre Eton, and try to use a nice odds of 1.80. Of course Memphis is not a team that can't win this game, but the Grizzlies are in a situation where the development of young players is more important to them than winning. Sansi, on the other hand, will try to prove that they have overcome that stage of the team that has no resultant ambition.


TOMAS BRAJANT (points (14.5), tip over, odds 1.85)


Bryant was one of the few bright spots last Washington season. This young center has appeared out of nowhere and has picked up a starting position and a new contract, and this season continues with good games. He is averaging 14.5 points, 10.3 rebounds, 2.4 blocks and 2.8 assists per game, and he could have his night tonight as Minnesota will play without suspended Carl-Anthony Towns. The Wolves will have Nou Vonle, Jordan Bell and Gorky Jeng in the center line, and Bryant is definitely a better player than the three of them.


KARIS LEVER (Points (17.5), Tip Over, Odds 1.85)


We expected the Lever this season, played by Brooklyn without Kevin Durant, to be the second player on the team, but no one was sure how he would fit in with Kari Irving. That doesn't look bad, Lever is averaging 18.5 points with 45.5% shot and 36.85 for three points. the five and Kairi and Karis could play.


AL HORFORD (Points (16.5), Tip Over, Odds 1.85)


Another player who could use the brawl of Karl-Anthony Towns and Joel Embid from two days ago and have a good game. Horford still has full minutes (32.8 minutes per game), but there should be a lot more space under the basket today. The fact is, on the other hand, there will be a very good Hasan Whiteside who knows how to close a racket, but Horford is averaging 14 points per game anyway. With Embido in the game, he had 11.8 shots per game, but that number could have been much higher had Horford against Atlanta not taken just four shots. Without Embidy, Horford will certainly have more shot opportunities, and if he hits with 42.6% of the season, the limit should be crossed.

SERIES

New Orleans has scored more points than the limit in all five games. Interestingly, they scored 122 and 123 points, respectively, and the least they gave was 116. The game limit against Oklahoma is 113.5. The Pelicans also have all five games with a total of more points per game. They scored the least points in their game against Dallas (239), and today's limit is 228.5. There were no more than 228 points in any Oklahoma game. Tander also has a five-game series with fewer points received than the limit, which is at 113.5 today. We already mentioned that New Orleans scored at least 116 points each time.
Orlando is the team that scores the least points in the league. They are averaging 94.8 points and have never managed to reach 100 points a game and have been below the limit in all five games so far. Also, all their matches ended with a total of less points than the limit. Nor is Denver giving too much - they are only 22nd in the league with 106 points per game. Both teams are receiving a little - Orlando 99.6 points and Denver 106.4 points per game. Today's limits are 98.5 points to Orlando, 102.5 to Denver and 201.5 all game.






It says
: Emir FULURI

Photo
: Reuters
